root:
Lord's Blade Lord's Blades follow the tradition set by the companion of the original Lord's Blade. They weaken enemies in preparation for a massive strike, using curved swords capable of bleeding and poisoning enemies. Their armaments do not protect well, but allow top-notch maneuverability.
No. That one's task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. That one's task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
Lord's Blades are equipped with curved swords which apply bleed and poison effects. With the right preparation, they tend to weaken enemies before delivering a lethal attack. Some elect to hinder enemies from the backline.
The stealthy assassins make for great scouts. By the fire, they prepare their weapons, meld with the shadows, and share memories of better days.
I will slay any you deem fit. Give the command. I will slay any you deem fit. Give the command.
Mutilate Backstab Golden Strike Fast Roll Thrown Tracer Silver Strike Estus Brew Move Mutilate Backstab Golden Strike Fast Roll Thrown Tracer Silver Strike Estus Brew
Simple Daggers Bandit's Knives Scimitar & Ghost Blade Painted Scimitar & Jagged Ghost Blade "Gold Tracer & Silver Tracer" Lord's Blade Armaments Wanderer's Robes Thief's Robes Assassin's Robes Shadow's Armor "Her Legacy" Lord's Blade Armor
Others:
Monster. Human. No difference.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Envenom Companionship Lurker Lloyd's Sagely Wisdom
Offensive Skill Hornet Ring Lloyd's Talisman Barbs Corrosive Brew Ambush Ring
Free Action, Gives Another Turn This ability adds 1pt bleed/blight if bled/blighted. Backstab Fast Roll
A lone lady clad in porcelain and abyssal robes walks into the Hamlet. "Have you seen my dearest companion?" You contemplate helping her find this man.
Let me help-- you need to be light on your feet. A human could kill you in your current condition. Hm? Oh, right. Sorry. Shh. You'll give away our position if you whine again!
I've found it's best to live for other people. Live for your team, and they'll live for you. Worry not. I've dispatched far worse.
Bide your time. Then strike. Always keep a dagger in the boot... Float like a bee. Sting like... me. *She smiles*
They say poison is a woman's weapon. *She chuckles.* Correct. This is how they'll die. Distract them, and let time do the rest. One dagger, one death. Just give it a few seconds.
Dearest companion... it has been so long. *She says with regret.* Forgive me. I arrived too late. The Lord of Light gave you an order. *sighs* If only I had been there!
*She melds with the shadows, taking silent watch.* *Her porcelain mask gives you, and the ambush party, the creeps.* Nobody shadows a shadow.
*She reads from a tome of proverbs.* Backstab to win. There is no honor during invasions. *She reads from a tome of proverbs.* Practice mercy. Only undead deserve chains. *She reads from a tome of proverbs.* Practice benevolence. Smite the undead to extinction.
...
My companion-- HE'S GONE! No human tells me what to do. I know nary a murmur of dark, fool.
Another. You died like Oolacile. The Age of Light lives on. Clean my blade before you die, filth. Like a human-- prone to error. The Abyss awaits you. Anor Londo's a lie today, but you'll still be dead in the morning.
not Lord's Blade Lord's Blade not Abysswalker Abysswalker
The Abyss will swallow the world!
There-- Abyssal abominations!
I will join you, Abysswalker.
You pathetic humans, shrouded in treachery!
I must survive!
Abysswalker, I'm so sorry...
My Fog Ring!? Where'd I put it!?
You took everything from me. No more.
I never surrender!
The Lord entrusted me with your demise.
This hornet has venom.
My Lord, the Age of Light will continue!
I see the weak spot!
*Clutches her side* Keep it together, girl.
End the fight here! Send them back to the Abyss! Watch-- I'll parry the world!
We are agents of the Lord. Send his enemies to the Abyss!
Here-- take this tonic. Apply this venom to your weapon. I'm ready to strike. I'll shrug off the pain. It consumed my beloved Abysswalker! ... will it consume us, too!? Lord, why send us!? Contorted creatures? Madness! The next wave will be misshapen and wicked! There are more-- where are they!? I'll see you on the other side, my beloved. I will join you soon. Carry me to the grave, sweet Abysswalker. Vain humans, doing a knight's task. Return underground, you filth. Your flawed nature reveals to me why humanity is doomed to Dark. It has claimed everyone-- except me! I must spread word of the Abyss! I cannot resist forever! Help! I would that your death come with mine, beloved. ... If only I had been there... I remember when he was a pup... I left my humanities somewhere else! I need more souls for the bonfire-- excuse me. Hee-- I forgot my titanite slab. I'm not dying today! Regroup and attack-- later! The Abyss can't be conquered! They're coming. They're coming for me! The Abyssal Father sends dark legions! Flee! Let me through! I'm ready. Just leave my soul. I will join you in the Abyss. Farm the titanite slabs! I bet they have humanities! More souls for the fire! I left it in bonfire storage-- one moment. Are these daggers +4 or +5? Estus? Yes, please! I failed him. My purpose is forfeit. Dear Abysswalker, I will join you soon. The Abyss will consume us both. Excuse me. I must grieve. The pain of loss still haunts me. Oh, Abysswalker... Stand back-- I'll win this NOW! This is my kill! I don't trust you with my survival! I'm out-- not dying today! You first. I'll follow. You take the first blow. I'll execute. No, they'll consume us all if we do that! No, you're unwise. Stop! We'll take it from here. No-- they're waiting to pounce! They'll summon more if we do that! I'll stay put. They lurk nearby. I refuse. Nope. I'll stay alive through my own means. I don't need you. Why? Pointless. Let my time pass. I need enough dexterity! Where's my Hornet Ring? I must have lost it. Are these swords or daggers? I see an Estus bottle! You withstand their attacks, and I'll follow-up! Use anything! EVERYTHING! It's my pain to endure! This is a great battle! No estus should make things interesting! Useless being! So fragile! Learn to roll. I know what needs to be done! Trust these blades. Filthy human! It's time to pass on. To the Abyss with me. Our time has come... Cursed world. I bet you're using a cracked orb. Are you a phantom!? You must be a phantom! Fear is crippling me. This is unbearable! I can't perish here. DID YOU SEE THEM ROLL!? White phantoms. Red phantoms. Gold phantoms. Blue phantoms. I can hear them near us. Survive. Dodge, and roll! I'll swing first and last. I'll create a breach in the enemy formation! I'll go first. I should have travelled with the Abysswalker. I'll exploit their weakness. You? You ARE a weakness. You're all soft. Be glad that I'm here to save you. You are all SO lucky to have me. You'd never last this long without me. We need an end... and mine is now. I'm ready to meet him in the Abyss. We ought to return to the Hamlet. White phantoms. Red phantoms. Blue Phantoms. Gold phantoms. I need to cool off a little bit! Pour on me some humanity! Are these shoes +5? Come at ME! Here, if you dare! Let my tale come to an end. I'm ready for death. I AM A RED PHANTOM! The Abysswalker died because of ME! Can you fast roll? Just stay safe and collect souls. Just DODGE! ****ing casual. Do you know the Blades of the Darkmoon? RED PHANTOM! Let's not discuss that parry. Who needs to dodge roll? This has to end. You don't need me. If I die, then they leave our world, right!? Woops! Forgot I was an ally. We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Write my miracle after I die. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? I will have this trophy! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. I feel fear. This is new! So cold and still-- like the dark! It's a gank! PHANTOMS!? That was predictable. I am not surprised. This is a great battle! You are a worthy opponent! Kill it before phantoms arrive! GANK SPANK! This is too much. I am no coward, why is this happening to me? It rolled. Did you guys hear that? It's an ambush! That wasn't smart. No stamina! Today is my worst day. Such a terrible day. I should have been faster. Move! Pathetic. Hardly noticed. Failure has invaded its world! Of course. There's no sun, so it's dark! This is so sad. I always expect the worst. We're going to die if you keep missing! MY LORD, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! STR, not DEX. ****ing casual. Go back to the bonfire, human filth. Next time, I'll journey alone. Amazing job, hollow! Of course. There's no hope. Darkness will consume us all. We need to leave. Great! Let's go... Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. Pft. Get good and try again. Please, just get a different weapon. Huh! Nothing happened. Did you try a lightning or fire weapon? They'll kill you! Now is our demise! I can see them coming for us. Very predictable! Of course. There's no sun, so it's dark. Failure has invaded your world. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? I can hear them. Come on, I'm itching for a fight. I hope we find a fight soon. Stop whining and let's move on. I'm not moving there. That's YOUR grave! No! No. No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. I want to fight. I'll take another scar. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... Humanity, only! Wait-- humanities are dark! Are you a phantom!? No healing in duels. Is that a hex!? Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Pointless. That will not help us win. Onward to our doom. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. That will not help us. This won't make any difference. Let me just decide for myself. The sun's gone-- what does it matter? I only accept stories of our Lord of Light. Hey, that's no miracle!.
That was so weak! I'm disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... O Nameless King, I wish I had found you... We shouldn't rest here... This place is cursed... I am very tired from being cursed... I can feel something near us... I know they are up to something. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... So boring, can we continue our journey. I hope we fight shortly. You all seem very new to all this. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. I wish I could rest a bit. I am very tireless right now. Give me a moment to recover some of my strength. This journey will end us. The results will be the same no matter what. I feel our end coming. All of this is too much for me. This journey is so confusing. Let's all get some sleep. This is a bad idea. I feel so tired and scared for no reason. This is a very confusing situation. I don't like this plan one bit. We need to fight more enemies. Where is a fight when you need one. You are not good enough. You are not worthy. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed for sure. I will lead us to victory. Loyalty is its own reward. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. I want to fight and not eat. This food is really bad. This is overcooked! It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's just eat later. Wow, this is pretty bad.
----------------------

The stealthy assassins make for great scouts. By the fire, they prepare their weapons, meld with the shadows, and

A lone lady clad in porcelain and abyssal robes walks into the Hamlet. "Have you seen my dearest companion?" You contemplate helping her find this man.
Let me help-- you need to be light on your feet. A human could kill you in your current condition. Hm? Oh, right. Sorry. Shh. You'll give away our position if you whine again!
I've found it's best to live for other people. Live for your team, and they'll live for you. Worry not. I've dispatched far worse.
Bide your time. Then strike. Always keep a dagger in the boot... Float like a bee. Sting like... me. *She smiles*
They say poison is a woman's weapon. *She chuckles.* Correct. This is how they'll die. Distract them, and let time do the rest. One dagger, one death. Just give it a few seconds.
Dearest companion... it has been so long. *She says with regret.* Forgive me. I arrived too late. The Lord of Light gave you an order. *sighs* If only I had been there!
*She melds with the shadows, taking silent watch.* *Her porcelain mask gives you, and the ambush party, the creeps.* Nobody shadows a shadow.
*She reads from a tome of proverbs.* Backstab to win. There is no honor during invasions. *She reads from a tome of proverbs.* Practice mercy. Only undead deserve chains. *She reads from a tome of proverbs.* Practice benevolence. Smite the undead to extinction.
...
My companion-- HE'S GONE! No human tells me what to do. I know nary a murmur of dark, fool.
Another. You died like Oolacile. The Age of Light lives on. Clean my blade before you die, filth. Like a human-- prone to error. The Abyss awaits you. Anor Londo's a lie today, but you'll still be dead in the morning.

You pathetic humans, shrouded in treachery!

My Fog Ring!? Where'd I put it!?
You took everything from me. No more.
I never surrender!

My Lord, the Age of Light will continue!

Клинок Повелителя Клинок Повелителя следует традиции установленной самим Путником Бездны. Они ослабляют противников перед тем как наносить сильный удар используя искривленные кинжалы, способные пускать кровь и отравлять противников. Сама Клинок Повелителя не очень хорошо защищена, но является очень ловким убийцей.
Нет. Это не его задание, здесь нужна я. Нет. Это не его задание, здесь нужна я.
Клинок Повелителя использует искривленные кинжалы чтобы отравлять своих противников и заставлять их истекать кровью. При грамотной подготовке: выбор оптимальных украшений и правильное применение их способностей, они способны значительно ослабить противников прежде чем наносить смертельный удар.
Скрытные убийцы которые смогут разведать обстановку. У огня они подготавливают свое оружие к следующей битве и тренируются оставаться в тени
Я убью любого на кого укажет Ваша рука. Жду приказа. Я убью любого на кого укажет Ваша рука. Жду приказа.

Кольцо с шершнем. Талисман Ллойда Колючка Искаженная настойка Кольцо засады
Эта настойка позволяет провести два хода сразу для более эффективной атаки! Эта способность добавляет 1 очк. кровотечения/яда если цель истекает кровью/находится под эффектом яда. Удар в спину Быстрый кувырок
Одинокая леди в одежде Бездны медленно заходит в Город. "Вы не видели моего товарища?" Помочь ей найти этого человека или нет решать уже Вам.
Позволь мне помочь -- мы еще нуждаемся в тебе. Любой человек смог бы убить тебя в таком состоянии. Хмм? Оу, да. Простите. Тс-с. Ты нас выдашь если не перестанешь хныкать!
Я и не знала, что жить ради других людей так хорошо. Живи для нас, а мы поживем для тебя. Не волнуйся. Бывало куда хуже.
Выжидай момент, а затем уже атакуй. Всегда храни нож в сапоге, пригодится... Порхай как бабочка, жаль как... Я *Улыбается*
Они говорят, что яд это оружие женщины. *Делает хитрую улыбку*. Это правда. Именно это их и убьет. Просто дайте время яду сделать свою работу. Один кинжал, одна смерть. Просто погодите несколько секунд.

Lord's Blade Lord's Blades follow the tradition set by the companion of the original Lord's Blade. They weaken enemies in preparation for a massive strike, using curved swords capable of bleeding and poisoning enemies. Their armaments do not protect well, but allow top-notch maneuverability.
No. That one's task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. That one's task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
Lord's Blades are equipped with curved swords which apply bleed and poison effects. With the right preparation, they tend to weaken enemies before delivering a lethal attack. Some elect to hinder enemies from the backline.
The stealthy assassins make for great scouts. By the fire, they prepare their weapons, meld with the shadows, and share memories of better days.
I will slay any you deem fit. Give the command. I will slay any you deem fit. Give the command.

A lone lady clad in porcelain and abyssal robes walks into the Hamlet. "Have you seen my dearest companion?" You contemplate helping her find this man.
Let me help-- you need to be light on your feet. A human could kill you in your current condition. Hm? Oh, right. Sorry. Shh. You'll give away our position if you whine again!
I've found it's best to live for other people. Live for your team, and they'll live for you. Worry not. I've dispatched far worse.
Bide your time. Then strike. Always keep a dagger in the boot... Float like a bee. Sting like... me. *She smiles*
They say poison is a woman's weapon. *She chuckles.* Correct. This is how they'll die. Distract them, and let time do the rest. One dagger, one death. Just give it a few seconds.
Dearest companion... it has been so long. *She says with regret.* Forgive me. I arrived too late. The Lord of Light gave you an order. *sighs* If only I had been there!
*She melds with the shadows, taking silent watch.* *Her porcelain mask gives you, and the ambush party, the creeps.* Nobody shadows a shadow.
*She reads from a tome of proverbs.* Backstab to win. There is no honor during invasions. *She reads from a tome of proverbs.* Practice mercy. Only undead deserve chains. *She reads from a tome of proverbs.* Practice benevolence. Smite the undead to extinction.
...
My companion-- HE'S GONE! No human tells me what to do. I know nary a murmur of dark, fool.
